# KNOUX Player X™

KNOUX Player X™ is a cutting-edge media player with modular architecture, built with TypeScript, React, and Electron.

## Features
- High-performance audio & video playback
- Subtitle support with AI-powered timing
- Theme & UI customization
- Plugin system
- Advanced diagnostics
- Cross-platform build

## Quick Start
```
npm install
npm run dev
```
